data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Ripipteryx from Colombia (Orthoptera, Ripipterygidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baena-Bejarano, Nathalie, Heads, Sam W. (2015): Three new species of the genus Ripipteryx from Colombia (Orthoptera, Ripipterygidae). ZooKeys 502: 129-143, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.502.8871, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.502.8871
